note.p: Career: Superintendent of the Physics Department, the National Physical Laboratory; Research Student, Trinity, Cambridge (1905-1910); National Physical Laboratory (1910-), Secretary and Chairman, International X-ray and Radium Protection Committee; Ex-President , Rontgen Society, British Institute of Radiology, Society of Radiographers, Section A, British Association. Secretary, National Radium Commission.
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 881-895, plate, by Ezer Griffiths
References: D Ambrose 'A History of Kaye and Laby' in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 49-59
